Player History
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1967...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/6/1968...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1968, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1970 to a 3-year deal worth $2,300,000 per year...
Injured on 5/9/1970 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1970, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Drafted in 5th round, 93rd overall pick, by Cleveland in 1973...
Had first career hit on 8/12/1978, off Gary Ross (BAL)...
Released by Cleveland on 9/8/1981...
